items.todoItem: Know that the fear of the Lord is the beginning of knowledge.
Know that fools despise wisdom and instruction.
Hear the advice of your father and mother and don’t ignore or forget it.
Don’t consent to go along with sinners when you are enticed by them.
Don’t be greedy of gain. It will cost you your life!
Turn around at wisdom’s reproof and stop ignoring good advice.
Know that God wishes to impart His wisdom to you.
Know that God will give His Holy Spirit and make His words known to those who turn to Him when rebuked.
Know that fear and destruction will come upon those who ignore and refuse God’s offer of advice and correction.
Do not wait until it is too late to call upon God’s wisdom.
Choose the fear of the Lord.
Know that those who choose to ignore God’s wisdom will suffer the consequences of their own choices and actions.
Know that those who follow after wisdom shall dwell in safety and free from fear of evil.
